title: FS graded T205 Cicotte, Fisher, Wallace no cap, 1 line
author: hcv123

posts.post_title: FS graded T205 Cicotte, Fisher, Wallace no cap, 1 line
posts.post_content:
Just back from SGC.  Prices are net to me and include insured shipping to you.  "I'll take it trumps negotiations".  I collect sales tax from NY delivery addresses.

Fisher SGC 2    200. (SOLD)
Cicotte  SGC 3  379.
Wallace SGC 1.5  1199. (SOLD)

I will take the Fisher.

Thanks,

Matt

Hi Matt. Wondering if the one line is still available. please contact me via my cell at 9083775660 or email: [url]brucerothsteindds3@gmail.com[/url]. Thanks!

                                             Bruce

posts.post_title: PM's are a better idea for responses to older posts
posts.post_content:
[quote name="brucerothstein76" post=2224518]is this still available?[/QUOTE]

Luckily I happened to be browsing the BST.  The Wallace was sold long ago (not on the BST).  The Cicotte is still available.
